artBlurb: During my education, one of the most influential classes I took was “Literature in the Age of AI” taught by professor Dennis Tenen. My eyes were opened to the ways that computer science, philosophy, and art could intermix and I wanted to contribute in my own way.

I have always been interested in visual arts, and have an array of work you can check out here. In the future, I want to create pieces of art that incorporate computer science, literature, and design into something new and powerful.

artProjects.name: Instagram Art
artProjects.shortDescription: A collection of my drawings going back to high school. Mainly pen + colored pencil.

bigProjects.name: Professor Review Site
bigProjects.shortDescription: Professor and course review site for Columbia university. Users can view 1000s of real, scraped reviews and submit their own. Data visualized using ChartJS.

bigProjects.name: IMDB Chatbot
bigProjects.shortDescription: Chatbot powered by AWS services that recommends top movies from IMDB. Implemented with a CICD pipeline and AWS serverless design.

smallProjects.name: Recipe Finder
smallProjects.shortDescription: Frontend app that lets users search for recipes and add their own. Created with Typescript and Styled Components. Integration tests written with Jest.

smallProjects.name: Dev Portfolio
smallProjects.shortDescription: You're looking at it. Software dev portfolio utilizing EJS and GSAP for animations. Hosted on AWS route 54 and EC2.

smallProjects.name: To Do List
smallProjects.shortDescription: Even a mighty oak must grow from a small seed. Simple frontend project in vanilla Javascript.
